      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(java.lang.String msg,
                        java.util.List<Contact> convos)
        Send a message to a list of different conversations
        Parameters:
        msg - Plain-text message to send
        convos - List of conversations to send the message to Note: This is not necessarily the list of destination contacts (i.e. groups -> group members)

      • sendMessage

        public void sendMessage​(java.lang.String msg)
        Given a message, prompt the user for a contact to send it to. Shortcut for sendMessage(msg, null).
        Parameters:
        msg - the message to send

      • openConversation

        public void openConversation​(java.lang.String conversationId,
                             java.lang.String conversationName,
                             java.lang.String targetUID,
                             boolean editable,
                             boolean switchable,
                             ChatManagerMapComponent.MessageDestination destination,
                             java.lang.String messageId)
        Opens a conversation window
        Parameters:
        conversationId - the conversation identifier
        conversationName - the conversation name
        targetUID - the destination of the conversation
        editable - if the conversation can be added to
        switchable - if the drop down is allowed to switch sides
        destination - the destination of the message
        messageId - the message identifier to scroll to or null

      • isSpecialGroup

        public static boolean isSpecialGroup​(java.lang.String id)

      • openConversation

        public void openConversation​(IndividualContact contact,
                             boolean editable)
        Given an individual contact, open the chat drop down for that contact.
        Parameters:
        contact - the individual contact
        editable - boolean if the user can use this drop down to chat or just view the current chat.

      • openConversation

        public void openConversation​(java.lang.String title,
                             java.lang.String uid,
                             Contact[] contacts,
                             boolean editable)
        Provides the ability to open a conversation as a drop down.
        Parameters:
        title - the title to provide the drop down
        uid - the uid of the conversation
        contacts - the contact list that is used to describe the conversation
        editable - if the user is allowed to send new chat in this opened drop down.

      • addChatMessageListener

        public void addChatMessageListener​(ChatManagerMapComponent.ChatMessageListener cml)
        Replacement for the intent currently in use for listening to all chat messages incoming to the system. Adds a chat message listener to be notified. Please note that the intent "com.atakmap.android.ChatMessagePopups.NEW_CHAT_RECEIVED" will be deprecated as of 4.8
        Parameters:
        cml - the chat message listener that is to be notified.

      • removeChatMessageListener

        public void removeChatMessageListener​(ChatManagerMapComponent.ChatMessageListener cml)
        Replacement for the intent currently in use for listenering to all chat messages incoming to the system. Removes a chat message listener to be notified. Please note that the intent "com.atakmap.android.ChatMessagePopups.NEW_CHAT_RECEIVED" will be deprecated as of 4.8
        Parameters:
        cml - the chat message listener that is to be notified.
